title: Attack of the Spooklings v1.1
description:
Cut down hordes of Spooklings in a desperate attempt to save your village!

Combining a classic arcade experience with satisfying swiping action, Attack of the Spooklings is the ultimate pocket power fantasy.

Features:

- Unlimited Slashing Action: Fight an endless onslaught of monsters until your inevitable demise.
- Deep Score System: Combos, Multipliers and lots of hidden bonuses.
- No 'Bomb' mechanic: Slash away! DonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t worry about hitting something you shouldn't.
- Competitive Drive: Brag about your highest scores on Twitter. Google Play Game Services coming soon!
- Stat-Fest: Plenty of stats to keep track of for the data-obsessed.
- Ever-growing: We plan to make this game as big as our players want it to be. New monster types and game modes? Power-ups? Screen-filling bosses? You name it!

What's New:

- FullHD screen devices are now supported.
- Upgraded the game's engine. It now runs smoother.
- You can now hit the Back button during play to pause the game.
- You can now exit the app hitting the Back button from the main menu.
- Fixed some Spookling formations to prevent overlapping. Now you can make even longer Pack Kill combos!
- 15 new Spookling formations!
Coming very soon:
- Google Play Services support with Leaderboards and Achievements!
- A new Spookling type!
